English: On way to heliport
Comment:
On load mission

STRM_23v01,To the left on the next crossroads and we're there!"

English: Someone's excited.
More than that, I am exhilarated! Attack squadron, Nikolay, we did it!\nWe're finally done with transporting shit every day, now we get to rule the skies!
Those skies will be contested by the enemy. Transport duty was at least safe, you know. For the most part.
Of course, of course, we were fired at once and had a lot of time for vodka breaks. But the attack helicopters, friend!
I'm with you on that one, Appolit, the machine itself will be great to fly. Here's hoping for V-80.
That would be abso-fucking-lutely brilliant! I am pumped just thinking about it!
Do we know anything about the squadron commander, Syomin?
I heard he's a tough son of a bitch. One of the best fighter pilots in the army. Arrived two days ago with reinforcements.
Probably downed more aircraft than the rest of us combined. He also doesn't take any shit.\nI heard if you piss him off, he shoots you from the air.
A lovely man. Let's meet him then.
Comrades Ablomov and Koltsov, finally. I've heard of your exploits in the transports.\nI'm giving you a chance to show me what you can do in attack aircraft.

I am colonel Syomin, welcome to my squadron. We were given two Mi24s for this mission.\nI presume you expected fancier model, like the V-80.\nPlace in that helicopter is earned and you can start with that today.
Keep close behind me and follow orders. We're going behind enemy lines, watch out for AA.\nOur first target is armoured convoy. Let's move!
ULYTANA TO FIREFLY, WE'RE TAKING OFF. HEADING NORTH ABOVE THE SEA THEN STRAIGHT FOR THE OBJECTIVE. OVER.
FIREFLY TO UYALANA, UNDERSTTOD. YOU HAVE GREEN LIGHT. RETURN SAFELY. FIREFLY OUT.
MAN, I WAS REALLY HOPING FOR V-80. THIS THING FEELS ONLY LIKE A SLIGHT UPGRADE FROM THE TRANSPORT CHOPPERS.
DON'T WORRY, WE'LL GET THERE YET. FOCUS FOR NOW, WE MUST BE READY FOR ANYTHING. WE'RE IN THE FIRST LINE NOW!
FOLLOW ME. WE WANT TO APPROACH THE CONVOY FROM THE NORTH, FROM THE SEA.
WEAPONS FREE, BLAST EVERYTHING TO SMITHEREENS!
THE CONVOY WON'T BE GOING ANYWHERE ANYMORE. WE STRIKE THE BASE NOW.
ULYANA TO FYODOR, WE'RE APPROACHING THE BASE FROM THE NORTH-WEST. WE'RE READY TO SUPPORT YOUR GROUND ATTACK. OVER.
FYODOR TO ULYANA, UNDERSTOOD. WE'RE LOOKING FORWWARD TO IT. WE'RE STARTING THE ATTACK. OUT.
FYODOR TO ULYANA. THANKS FOR THE HELP. WE'LL TAKE IT FROM HERE. GOOD WORK. OUT.
YOU HEAD THEM BOYS. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. THAT WASN;T BAD FOR PEOPLE FROM TRANSPORTS. I CAN MAKE SOMETHING OUT OF YOU YET. WE'RE GOING BACK TO THE HELIPORT. OUT.
Heliport
Destroy Convoy
Destroy Armour
Friendly Units
